backend/main.mo: Defines a large set of types for chat, video generation, cold email, profiles, coins, and transactions, forming the backend data model.
feature_evidence.json: Lists implemented features with evidence, related files, components, test IDs, and confidence metadata.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Contains prewritten summaries describing the purpose of each frontend file in the project.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base styles defining a custom OKLCH color system and light/dark theme variables.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point defining the root container and loading the main React script.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Initializes React Query and wraps the app with the Internet Identity provider and global toaster.
frontend/src/components/AppContent.tsx: Auth gate component that shows LoginScreen when unauthenticated and AuthenticatedLayout when authenticated.
frontend/src/components/AuthenticatedLay: Authenticated app shell with header, navigation, coin balance display, mobile menu, and routed screen rendering.
frontend/src/components/CoinGate.tsx: UI wrapper that checks coin balance and shows an insufficient-coins alert with a Buy Coins button when needed.
frontend/src/components/CoinPurchaseDial: Displays purchase plans, lets users select a coin pack, and triggers purchase via hooks with loading and error handling.
frontend/src/components/TransactionHisto: Shows recent coin transactions with icons, formatted amounts, and timestamps, using a scrollable list.
frontend/src/constants/coins.ts: Defines coin pricing constants and user-facing low‑balance and insufficient‑coins messages.
frontend/src/constants/languages.ts: Exports a large list of language options for UI selectors.
frontend/src/hooks/coinQueryKeys.ts: Provides centralized React Query keys for balance, plans, and transaction history.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches a backend actor based on user identity and refreshes dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useAIImageGenerator.t: Handles AI image generation by building backend params, submitting them, and returning placeholder images with loading/error state.
frontend/src/hooks/useAIVideoMaker.ts: Generates scripts and storyboards by sending video requests to the backend using identity and form settings.
frontend/src/hooks/useChat.ts: Manages chat state, validates image attachments, sends messages to the backend, and handles coin-related errors.
frontend/src/hooks/useCoinBalance.ts: Fetches the user's coin balance using react-query and the backend actor.
Loads available coin purchase plans from the backend via react-query.
frontend/src/hooks/useColdEmailGenerator: Calls the backend to generate cold emails and handles coin errors and loading state.
frontend/src/hooks/useHashRoute.ts: Controls view navigation using URL hash changes and exposes a navigate function.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity login, logout, and identity state through a React context.
frontend/src/hooks/useProfile.ts: Fetches and updates the caller's user profile using react-query and backend actor methods.
frontend/src/hooks/usePurchaseCoins.ts: Triggers backend coin purchases and refreshes coin-related queries after success.
frontend/src/hooks/useSeoPackGenerator.t: Generates SEO packs by calling the backend and manages loading and error states.
frontend/src/hooks/useSubtitlesGenerator: Generates subtitles through the backend and parses results into normal and SRT formats.
frontend/src/hooks/useTransactionHistory: Fetches the user's coin transaction history from the backend.
frontend/src/hooks/useVoiceoverGenerator: Generates voiceovers through the backend and manages loading and error states.
frontend/src/hooks/useYouTubeScript.ts: Builds a detailed prompt to request a YouTube script from the backend and handles coin errors.
frontend/src/index.css: Sets up Tailwind layers, global fonts, and extensive light/dark theme CSS variables plus base element styles.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and Internet Identity providers before rendering App.
frontend/src/pages/ai-video-maker/buildP: Generates a text-based placeholder video timeline summarizing settings, music options, and photo sequence timing.
frontend/src/pages/ai-video-maker/musicL: Generates a list of 1500 music tracks across predefined categories and exports the music categories.
frontend/src/pages/ai-video-maker/MusicL: Shows a searchable, filterable list of music tracks and allows selecting one for video projects.
frontend/src/pages/ai-video-maker/PhotoT: Manages photo uploads and ordering, letting users add, reorder, and remove photos for a video timeline.
frontend/src/pages/AIChatScreen.tsx: Implements an AI chat UI with message sending, image attachments, validation handling, and coin-purchase prompts.
frontend/src/pages/AIImageGeneratorScree: Provides an AI image generator interface with style controls, prompt inputs, generation calls, and image download support.
frontend/src/pages/AIVideoMakerScreen.ts: Builds a multi-step AI video creation tool handling script, storyboard, animation planning, and timeline generation.
frontend/src/pages/ColdEmailScreen.tsx: Generates tailored cold emails based on sender/recipient inputs with tone options and follow-up/spam analysis toggles.
frontend/src/pages/DashboardScreen.tsx: Displays the app dashboard with navigation to features, coin balance status, and purchase options.
frontend/src/pages/LoginScreen.tsx: Renders the login page with Internet Identity authentication, branding, and a sign‑in button with loading state.
frontend/src/pages/ProfileScreen.tsx: Displays and edits user profile data with avatar, display name, principal copy, and logout functionality.
frontend/src/pages/ProjectDefinitionScre: Provides a form for entering project requirements and shows a summary after submission with reset capability.
frontend/src/pages/youtube-script/Script: UI component for configuring and generating YouTube scripts, handling user input, errors, and script display.
frontend/src/pages/youtube-script/SeoPac: UI for generating a YouTube SEO pack and copying all generated metadata including titles, tags, and descriptions.
frontend/src/pages/youtube-script/Subtit: Provides UI to generate subtitles from script or voiceover, with copy and SRT download options.
frontend/src/pages/youtube-script/Voiceo: UI for generating AI voiceovers from a script with options for gender, language, speed, and emotion.
frontend/src/pages/YouTubeScriptScreen.t: Hosts a tabbed interface for generating YouTube scripts, voiceovers, subtitles, and SEO packs.
frontend/src/utils/aiVideoMakerSummary.t: Builds a formatted summary string describing video maker settings from form data.
frontend/src/utils/coinErrors.ts: Utility functions to detect insufficient coin errors and map them to user‑friendly messages.
frontend/src/utils/downloadImageFile.ts: Triggers downloading an image file from a given URL and filename.
frontend/src/utils/downloadTextFile.ts: Creates and downloads a text file from provided content and filename.
frontend/src/utils/imageAttachment.ts: Utilities for reading image files, converting to/from blob URLs, validating type/size, and getting dimensions.
frontend/src/utils/parseYouTubeScript.ts: Parses a raw YouTube script into ordered sections based on headings and predefined section order.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers to read URL parameters (including hash routing), persist them in sessionStorage, and remove them from the hash.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with plugins, custom colors, typography, spacing, animations, and container settings.
project_state.json: Describes the app’s current architecture, feature set, authentication plans, coin system rules, and outstanding feature requests.
